冭字的基本解释

冭
tài
古同“太”。
古同“泰”。

冭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tài］
［《廣韻》他蓋切，去泰，透。］
“冭1”的今字。“夳1”的今字。
(1)通达；通畅。
(2)安舒；安宁。
(3)好，美好。
(4)宽裕。
(5)骄纵。
(6)奢侈。
(7)大。
(8)太；过甚。
(9)极。参见“泰古”。
(10)卦名。《周易》六十四卦之一，乾下坤上。为上下交通之象。
(11)古代酒器名。
(12)山名。参见“泰山”。
(13)州名。辽置。治所在乐康（今吉林省洮安县东）。金大定二十五年废。承安二年复置，移治长春（今吉林省乾安县北），辖境扩至今洮儿河下游地区，为当时边防重地。金末废。参阅《金史·地理志上》。
(14)州名。五代南唐置。治所在海宁县（今泰州市）。辖境相当今江苏省泰州市、泰县、如皋、泰兴、兴化等县地。元改泰州路总管府，后复原名。明清沿置。参阅清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·江南五·泰州》。

冭字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【冫字部】　冭； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页131第23
【集韻】他蓋切，音汰。【玉篇】今作泰。【說文】大也，通也。或省作太。亦作大泰。【易·泰卦】天地交泰。又【說文】泰，滑也。又【六書故】冭，他達切，音獺。冰凍滑冭也。俗作汰澾。左傳伯棼射王汰輈註：汰，過也，箭過車轅上也。

冭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
冭字的起名意思

暂无。

冭
Basic explanation of words
冭
tài
Gu Tong "too".
Ancient Tong "Thai".
冭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tài］
["Guangyun" He covers and cuts, goes to Thailand, and thoroughly. ]
The present character of "冭1". The present character of "夳1".
(1) Accessibility; unobstructed.
(2) Comfortable; tranquility.
(3) Good, beautiful.
(4) Be generous.
(5) Pride and indulgence.
(6) Luxury.
(7) Big.
(8) Too; too much.
(9) Extremely. See "Taigu".
(10) The hexagram name. One of the sixty-four hexagrams in the Book of Changes, Qianxia Kun Shang. It is the image of traffic up and down.
(11) Names of ancient wine vessels.
(12) The name of the mountain. See "Tarzan".
(13) State name. Liaozhi. It was governed in Lekang (now east of Tao'an County, Jilin Province). Jin Dading was abolished in 25 years. Cheng'an was restored in the second year and moved to Changchun (now north of Qian'an County, Jilin Province), and its jurisdiction expanded to the lower reaches of the Taoer River, which was the important frontier defense at that time. Gold is scrapped. See "Gold History·Geography".
(14) State name. Five Dynasties and Southern Tang Dynasty. It was located in Haining County (now Taizhou City). It has jurisdiction over the counties of Taizhou, Taixian, Rugao, Taixing, Xinghua and other counties in Jiangsu Province today. Yuan changed to Taizhou Road General Administration Office, and later restored its name. Ming and Qing dynasties. Refer to Qing Gu Zuyu's "Minutes of Reading History and Fangyu·Jiangnan Five·Taizhou".
冭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [冫字部] 　冭; Kangxi strokes: 5; Page number: page 131 23
[Jiyun] He covers and cuts, and Yintai. [Jade articles] Jin Zuotai. [Said Wen] Da Ye, Tong Ye. Or save too much. Also known as Datai. [Easy·Tai Gua] Heaven and Earth pay Thai. Also 【Said Wen】Tai, also slippery. Also 【Liu Shu Gu】Xin, Tadachi, sound otter. Frozen and slippery. The common practice is Tai Lai. Zuo Chuan Bodi shoots Wang Taiyu. Note: Tai, go too, the arrow passes the wheel of the car.
